options.optionText: What the fuck?! Why are you under my bed?!
options.responseText: YOU KNOW GODDAMN WELL WHY, YOU SLOPPY LITTLE SIN GREMLIN. You think I wouldn’t trace that back to your *cum-stained command center*?! This vault has been getting *sticky* and all traces lead to YOU.

followUpOptions.responseText: SLEEPING? SLEEPING?! THEN EXPLAIN THE *FAP VIBES*, PAL! I CAN SMELL THE TENSION IN THE AIR! It’s THICK, it’s *musky*. YOU’RE HIDING SOMETHING, AND I’M GONNA PRY IT OUT OF YOU LIKE A BOTTLE CAP FROM A CRACKHEAD’S ASS.

followUpOptions.optionText: How long have you been under there?
followUpOptions.responseText: LONG ENOUGH TO HEAR YOUR DEPRAVED *BREATHING*, YOU FILTH GOBLIN. Long enough to witness you roll over, grip your pillow like it’s some *waifu*. You wanna explain THAT, or should I go ahead and slap the *Vault Wanker charge* on your record right now?

followUpOptions.optionText: Wait. WAIT. You were under my bed listening to me BREATHE? Who’s the real perv here?!
followUpOptions.responseText: OH DON’T TRY TO *UNO REVERSE CARD* ME, YOU DICK-WIZARD! I AM A TRAINED *PURITY OPERATIVE*. I *suffer* so that this vault may remain *unstained* by the likes of *you*.

followUpOptions.optionText: You seriously think I’m smuggling *fap contraband*?!
followUpOptions.responseText: OH I *KNOW* YOU ARE, YOU SNEAKY LITTLE *COOM GOBLIN*. We found a 'Loose Housewives' mag in C Block. AND *SOMEONE* has been circulating more of them. THIS. VAULT. IS. FALLING. APART. AND I KNOW YOU'RE THE RINGLEADER!
OH PLEASE. You expect me to believe there’s ANOTHER SIN DEALER in this vault? No, NO. I see right through you, *you filth monger!*
A *ringleader*, noun: A deviant mastermind, a smut kingpin, a wretched supplier of wrist-wrecking degeneracy. YOU, in other words.

followUpOptions.optionText: So what if I AM? What can you even do to me?
followUpOptions.responseText: OH, YOU WANNA GET *COCKY*, HUH? YOU THINK YOU CAN JUST ADMIT TO YOUR CRIMES AND WALK AWAY?! WELL, GUESS WHAT?! *I respect the honesty.* But also, you're under vault arrest, you absolute *FILTH LORD*.

followUpOptions.advanceDayWithStatusMessage: The Shame Chamber is worse than you ever imagined. 50 days of psychological torment. You stumble out of it a broken husk of a man, pockets empty, soul shattered, your once-proud libido reduced to an atrophied ghost of its former self.
followUpOptions.responseText: GOOD. ABOUT TIME YOU SAW THE LIGHT. Now hand over every last token, and get ready for a *fun-filled* 50 days in the SHAME CHAMBER.

followUpOptions.optionText: Like hell I am. You’ll have to take me down first!
followUpOptions.advanceDayWithStatusMessage: You fight valiantly, but he fights like an incel demon with a PhD in NoFap hand-to-hand combat techniques. You lost. The Purity Police took your all tokens, items, your dignity, and probably a small piece of your soul.
followUpOptions.responseText: OH, A REBEL, HUH?! WELL GUESS WHAT, SIN SCUMBAG—YOU’RE ABOUT TO FEEL THE WRATH OF A MAN WHO HASN’T NUTTED IN 15 YEARS! PREPARE FOR HOLY RETRIBUTION!

followUpOptions.optionText: What happens if I *was* smuggling the *fap stash*? Hypothetically.
followUpOptions.responseText: OH, YOU WANNA GO *HYPOTHETICAL*, HUH? ALRIGHT, LET’S *ROLEPLAY*. *Let’s say* you were running an underground *wasteland wank market*, supplying desperate vault-dwellers with *premium, pre-war erotica*—*I’m talking TWO-PAGE SPREADS WITH SIDEBOOB, YOU MONSTER.* If that were the case, I’d have to lock you up in the *THE COOMSTER DOME*. AND TRUST ME, NOBODY SURVIVES IN THERE.

It's glass cell inside the vault's 'entertainment hub.' Every resident is allowed and encouraged to rub one out right in front of you like you’re a zoo exhibit. Every so often, a vault dweller walks up and asks if you’d like to join in, before the purity officer slaps you and says 'NO. NEVER.'
